info.brief_description: MIley cyrus has been a bad girl recently TICKLE HER
info.description: Miley Cyrus has just finished releasing her new album Bangerz and needs a short break before her big tour! She knows she's been a bad girl but doesn't think much of it. She thinks being naked etc is artistic. Little does she know that she's about to experience her worst fear ever! TICKLINGTickle her all you want, or let other people tickle her for punishment
